txt.en: 'A lovely story, wonderful song, and my, how strong!'
Greeting Fastrada Túcca
<rgb=#FF0000>You have left the Lyndelby gazebo!</rgb>

'I wasn't going to meet you, stranger, no matter how many others found you to be helpful or pleasant. Then I heard that you're quite strong, performing all sorts of tasks for the village. I also heard that you know some stories and songs that I do not know. That was what convinced me. I'm Fastrada Túcca. No, no, do not tell your story here and now! You must perform for the whole town. Come, let us go to the gazebo in the town's centre!'
Tell a <rgb=#FF00FF>story</rgb> to the audience
<rgb=#FF0000>Sing</rgb> a song for the audience
<rgb=#FF0000>You have left the Lyndelby gazebo!</rgb>
Perform at the Lyndelby gazebo
The gazebo can be found in the village centre.\n\nYou should get on stage and tell a story!
The gazebo can be found in the village centre.\n\nYou should get on stage!
Tell a <rgb=#FF0000>Story</rgb> to the audience
The gazebo can be found in the village centre.\n\nYou should get on stage and show off your strength!
Perform at the Lyndelby gazebo
Perform a <rgb=#FF00FF>handstand</rgb> for the audience
Perform a <rgb=#FF0000>Handstand</rgb> for the audience
It is time to give your best performance!
Fastrada Túcca can be found in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should talk to Fastrada Túcca.

'A lovely story, wonderful song, and my, how strong you've gotten since last I saw you!

'It is curious how adventures seem to make for such engrossing stories! You almost make me want to go off on an adventure of my own. Not quite, but nearly, and that is impressive enough!

'I'm certain you have more to share with us, [placeholder], but it is your visit, after all. You should take some time to rest in Lyndelby before you leave again!'
The crowd is impressed

'Well, well! If it isn't [placeholder] back from another great adventure! You've finally time enough for another visit to Lyndelby?

'I've heard that you're performing all sorts of tasks today for the others here in the village, but it seems such a waste to me. You've been out in the world, after all! You know stories and songs that none among us do, and by the look of it, your adventures have made you quite strong, too. All of Lyndelby ought to know just how exciting your adventures have been and what you've learned from your journeys across the world!

'That's right! You'll have to perform for all of Lyndelby. You're not nervous, are you?

'Come, let us go to the gazebo in the town's centre!'

'A lovely story, wonderful song, and my, how strong. I have not been this entertained in many, many years. I do hope you will stay a while longer. You must have more songs and stories to share with us?'
There are many occupants of the hidden village of Lyndelby who are curious to meet with you.
Perform at the Lyndelby gazebo
The crowd is awed by your strength!
<rgb=#FF00FF>Sing</rgb> a song for the audience
The gazebo can be found in the village centre.\n\nYou should get on stage and sing!
Talk to Fastrada Túcca in Lyndelby
The crowd is impressed
Head to the Lyndelby gazebo
The audience was enthralled by the tale you spun!
<rgb=#FF0000>You have left the Lyndelby gazebo!</rgb>
'I heard that you're quite strong, performing all sorts of tasks for the village.'
